scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-config && npm run prepare-dist
scripts.copy-config: powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Force host.json dist/; Copy-Item -Force package*.json dist/"
scripts.prepare-dist: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist\test) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist\test }; Push-Location dist; npm ci --omit=dev; Pop-Location"
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build
